title: Calories in McDonald's Medium Chips
meta_description: Discover calories in McDonald's medium chips, including full nutrition breakdown like fat, carbs, protein, and easy tweaks for your meal.
assumptions: Standard McDonald's medium fries (UK portion, ~340g), salted, cooked in vegetable oil, no dips or customizations.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, preparation, and portion size; values based on McDonald's UK data. Check app or packaging for latest.

quick_answer.text: One medium serving of McDonald's chips contains ~337 kcal and 4.2 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison with packaging.

tweaks.label: Add one sachet of tomato ketchup

faqs.q: How many calories are in McDonald's medium chips?
What is the fat content in McDonald's medium chips?
faqs.a: About 15 g total fat, including 1.3 g saturated fat.

faqs.q: Are McDonald's medium chips high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, around 264 mg sodium per serving due to salting.

faqs.q: How many carbs in McDonald's medium chips?
faqs.a: Roughly 43 g carbs, with 4.1 g fiber and 0.3 g sugars.
A modest 4.2 g protein per medium serving.
